name: Cave Survivors
description:
To survive in the depest depths of these caves you must kill as many monsters as you can to get can as strong as you can, and then kill more monsters to get even stronger... And then kill even more monsters to get even more stronger.

You must survive these endless waves of monsters with the limited amount of weapons at your poscession, you can upgrade these weapons and your characters to get as strong as possible so to be able to survive even longer.

Good luck on surviving what nameless horrors awaits you!
